channel.title: Blogs on Bruce Wu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Bruce Wu's Blog

item.title: Project - London Cycling Analytics
item.description: Table of Contents The Essence of TFL’s Cycling Data The Architectural Blueprint The Dashboard: A Window to Cycling Trends Setting the Stage: Pipeline Implementation To optimize the provided blog content on “London’s TFL cycling data pipeline”, I suggest several enhancements for SEO and reader engagement.

item.title: Project - Building a small project with AWS
item.description: In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, integrating various cloud services into small projects has become crucial for streamlined and efficient project management.

item.title: Analytics Engineering (dbt + BigQuery + Data Studio)
item.description: When it comes to working with data, many challenges arise. One of the biggest challenges is building a reliable and scalable data pipeline that can handle large volumes of data while ensuring the data’s accuracy and consistency.

item.title: Model Deployment (K8s and EKS)
item.description: In this article, I’ll explore how to deploy an existing Keras model to AWS-EKS using TensorFlow Serving and Kubernetes.

item.title: Optimising Data Pipelines for Cryptocurrency Analysis: Airflow, Kafka, MongoDB
item.description: Table of Contents Project Diagram Setting Up the Environment Data Acquisition MongoDB: The Database Choice Python Integration with MongoDB Kafka: Streamlining Data Flow Airflow: Automating ETL Processes Additional Resources Project Diagram Setting Up the Environment Ubuntu 20.

item.title: AutoKeras (AutoML)
item.description: Greater model parameters and network design are always preferred for better performance during model training.

item.title: Create COVID-19 Dashboard by Data studio
item.description: 自己來動手製作的COVID-19 Dashboard吧，本篇將透過GCP雲端服務自動抓取最新的疫情資料，並使用Google的可視化工具Data studio串接來製作每日自動更新的疫情儀表板。 Data source CSSEGISandData/COVID-19 Diagram 透過Cloud Scheduler定時觸發Cloud Functions中部署的爬蟲程式,並將資料儲存至Cloud Storage，並由Data Studio即時讀取最新資料並製作COVID-19即時資訊儀表板。

item.title: Markdown test
item.description: Markdown Example Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores.
